as3DataValidation

Summary
as3DataValidation
Variables
DECIMAL_DIGITS@private
LC_ROMAN_LETTERS@private
Functions
hasInValidCharsCompare a string against a list of characters to determine if the string does not contain those characters.
hasValidCharsCompare a string against a list of characters to determine if the string contains only those characters.
isIPDetermine whether a string is a valid IP address
isFileURLDetermine whether a string is a Windows file URL
isHttpsURLPerforms basic checks to determine if a string is a valid HTTPS URL
isHttpURLPerforms basic checks to determine if a string is a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL
isEmailDetermines whether a string is an email address.
isSSNIs a String a valid Social Security Number Valid examples are 111-11-1111 or 111111111
isZipChecks for a valid US Zip code Valid examples include 12345, 123456789 and 12345-6789 for US Valid examples for Canada include Z1Z-1Z1 and Z1Z 1Z1
isUSPhoneNumberDetermines whether the string is a valid US Phone Number with the area code Examples include (555) 555-5555, 555-555-5555, 555 555-5555, +1 (234) 555-5555
isCreditCardValidate a credit card using the LUHN-10 Method This function ignores spaces and dashes Length is checked based on card type
isDigitCasts a string as a number.
isLetterDetermines if n is within A-Z or a-z
isAlphaNumericDetermines whether the string contains only alphabetic and numeric characters
isLetterOrDigitDoes the character contain an alphabetic character or number
isNotEmptyDetermines whether the string contains data
isIntegerInRangeDetermines whether the integer with a specified range
isWorldDateDetermines whether the string contains a valid day-first format date
isDateDetermines if the string contains a valid date.
escapeHTMLHTML Encodes characters within a string for use in an HTML Text Field The characters escaped include: <>’&”
containsScriptSchemesChecks to determine if a string contains a possible scripting tags.

Variables

DECIMAL_DIGITS

private static var DECIMAL_DIGITS: String

@private

LC_ROMAN_LETTERS

private static var LC_ROMAN_LETTERS: String

@private

Functions

hasInValidChars

public function hasInValidChars(str: String,
chars: String):Boolean

Compare a string against a list of characters to determine if the string does not contain those characters.  This comparison is not case-senstive and it does not validate that the characters are in a particular order.

Parameters

strThe string that needs to be validated
charsThe list of valid characters for that string

Returns

A Boolean true value if the data is valid

hasValidChars

public function hasValidChars(str: String,
chars: String):Boolean

Compare a string against a list of characters to determine if the string contains only those characters.  This comparison is not case-sensitive and does not validate the order of the characters.

Parameters

strThe string that needs to be validated
charsThe list of valid characters for that string

Returns

A Boolean true value if the data is valid

isIP

public function isIP(ip: String):as3ValidationResult

Determine whether a string is a valid IP address

Parameters

ipThe string containing the IP address

Returns

An as3ValidationResult.result true value if the data is valid.  If the data is invalid, then as3Validation.result is set to false and the errorStr provides a brief description. 

isFileURL

public function isFileURL(fileURL: String):as3ValidationResult

Determine whether a string is a Windows file URL

Parameters

fileURLThe string containing the IP address

Returns

An as3ValidationResult.result true value if the data is valid.  If the data is invalid, then as3Validation.result is set to false and the errorStr provides a brief description. 

isHttpsURL

public function isHttpsURL(str: String,  
domain: String = ""):as3ValidationResult

Performs basic checks to determine if a string is a valid HTTPS URL

Parameters

strThe string containing the HTTPS URL
domainThe expected domain for the URL (optional)

Returns

An as3ValidationResult.result true value if the data is valid.  If the data is invalid, then as3Validation.result is set to false and the errorStr provides a brief description. 

isHttpURL

public function isHttpURL(str: String,  
domain: String = "",
isSSL: Boolean = false):as3ValidationResult

Performs basic checks to determine if a string is a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL

Parameters

strThe string containing the URL
domainThe expected domain for the URL (optional)
isSSLA boolean value that is set to true for HTTPS URLs (optional)

Returns

An as3ValidationResult.result true value if the data is valid.  If the data is invalid, then as3Validation.result is set to false and the errorStr provides a brief description. 

isEmail

public function isEmail(str: String):as3ValidationResult

Determines whether a string is an email address.  Checks for common email address formats but it does not support the full RFC definition

Parameters

strThe string containing the email address

Returns

An as3ValidationResult.result true value if the data is valid.  If the data is invalid, then as3Validation.result is set to false and the errorStr provides a brief description. 

isSSN

public function isSSN(inStr: String,  
dashOpt: Boolean = false):as3ValidationResult

Is a String a valid Social Security Number Valid examples are 111-11-1111 or 111111111

Parameters

inStrThe string that will be validated
dashOptThis boolean is set to true if the dash character is optional?  (optional)

Returns

An as3ValidationResult.result true value if the data is valid.  If the data is invalid, then as3Validation.result is set to false and the errorStr provides a brief description. 

isZip

public function isZip(str: String,  
allowCAN: Boolean = false):as3ValidationResult

Checks for a valid US Zip code Valid examples include 12345, 123456789 and 12345-6789 for US Valid examples for Canada include Z1Z-1Z1 and Z1Z 1Z1

Parameters

strThe string to be validated
allowCANSet this Boolean to true to allow US and Canadian zip codes (optional)

Returns

Am as3ValidationResult.result true value if the data is valid.  If the data is invalid, then as3Validation.result is set to false and the errorStr provides a brief description. 

isUSPhoneNumber

public function isUSPhoneNumber(inStr: String):as3ValidationResult

Determines whether the string is a valid US Phone Number with the area code Examples include (555) 555-5555, 555-555-5555, 555 555-5555, +1 (234) 555-5555

Parameters

strThe string to be validated

Returns

An as3ValidationResult.result true value if the data is valid.  If the data is invalid, then as3Validation.result is set to false and the errorStr provides a brief description. 

isCreditCard

public function isCreditCard(str: String):as3ValidationResult

Validate a credit card using the LUHN-10 Method This function ignores spaces and dashes Length is checked based on card type

Parameters

strThe credit card number as a String

Returns

An as3ValidationResult.result true value if the data is valid.  If the data is invalid, then as3Validation.result is set to false and the errorStr provides a brief description. 

isDigit

public function isDigit(n: String):Boolean

Casts a string as a number.  If it fails, returns false.

Parameters

nThe String of the number to validate

Returns

A Boolean true value if the data is valid

isLetter

public function isLetter(n: String):Boolean

Determines if n is within A-Z or a-z

Parameters

nThe character to validate

Returns

A Boolean true value if the data is valid

isAlphaNumeric

public function isAlphaNumeric(str: String):Boolean

Determines whether the string contains only alphabetic and numeric characters

Parameters

strThe string to validate

Returns

A Boolean true value if the data is valid

isLetterOrDigit

public function isLetterOrDigit(n: String):Boolean

Does the character contain an alphabetic character or number

Parameters

nThe character to validate

Returns

A Boolean true value if the data is valid

isNotEmpty

public function isNotEmpty(str: String,  
white: Boolean = false):Boolean

Determines whether the string contains data

Parameters

strThe character to validate
whiteA boolean when set to false will ignore white space (space, newline, tab)

Returns

A Boolean true value if the string is not empty

isIntegerInRange

public function isIntegerInRange(nString: String,
min: int,
max: int):Boolean

Determines whether the integer with a specified range

Parameters

nThe String representing the number to validate
minThe minimum value as a Number (>= comparison)
maxThe maxium value as a Number (<= comparison)

Returns

A Boolean true value if the data is within the range

isWorldDate

public function isWorldDate(str: String):as3ValidationResult

Determines whether the string contains a valid day-first format date

Parameters

strThe string containing a date in a day-first format

Returns

A Boolean true value if the date is a valid day-first date

isDate

public function isDate(str: String,  
dayFirst: Boolean = false):as3ValidationResult

Determines if the string contains a valid date.  Valid Examples include 9/30/09, 9-30-09 or 9.30.09

Parameters

strThe String containing the date
dayFirstWhether the date is in a day first format

Returns

An as3ValidationResult.result true value if the data is valid.  If the data is invalid, then as3Validation.result is set to false and the errorStr provides a brief description. 

escapeHTML

public function escapeHTML(str: String):String

HTML Encodes characters within a string for use in an HTML Text Field The characters escaped include: <>’&”

Parameters

strThe String containing the HTML data

Returns

An HTML encoded version of the original string. 

containsScriptSchemes

public function containsScriptSchemes(htmlString: String):Boolean

Checks to determine if a string contains a possible scripting tags.  This function only checks for javascript:, event:, vbscript: and asfunction: links It will not check for data:, mailto: or other tags.

Parameters

strThe string that will be checked.

Returns

A Boolean true value if the string contains the forbidden text
